code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskFilter=_ref=>{let{currentFilter,onFilterChange,taskCounts}=_ref;const filters=[{key:'all',label:'All Tasks',count:taskCounts.all,icon:'üìã'},{key:'pending',label:'Pending',count:taskCounts.pending,icon:'‚è≥'},{key:'completed',label:'Completed',count:taskCounts.completed,icon:'‚úÖ'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-filter",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"filter-tabs",children:filters.map(filter=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>onFilterChange(filter.key),className:`filter-tab ${currentFilter===filter.key?'active':''}`,"aria-pressed":currentFilter===filter.key,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"filter-icon",children:filter.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"filter-label",children:filter.label}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"filter-count",children:filter.count})]},filter.key))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"filter-summary",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"summary-text",children:["Showing ",taskCounts[currentFilter]," ",currentFilter==='all'?'total':currentFilter,taskCounts[currentFilter]===1?' task':' tasks']})})]});};export default TaskFilter;
